item.description: This is going to be a session where will figure out as a group how to use the recaptcha function from the recaptcha website for both php and asp options. We will hold meeting at Theo's house in Northampton. I will email all members directions who rsvp (the website function) yes on saturday. This is another hands on workshop so bring laptops and there is wireless.
item.how_to_find_us: If you rsvp'd after 10pam today call me and I will email directions. my phone is 360-774-6448.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: March Meet up #2: Recaptcha Revisit Workshop
